deleteOriginal.title: Delete original
deleteOriginal.description: If false, we keep the original entry plus the folded keys. If true, only folded keys are kept.

separator.title: Separator string
separator.description: Character or string, used to separate key-levels, that should be folded.

selectionRegExp.title: Selection RegExp
selectionRegExp.description: Optional RegExp to select a subset of the keys to fold.
